channel.title: PI adding dialogue when you log in for the first time!
channel.description: Hey guys, ok.. i really need help with this.. i already have my dialogue into dialogue handler, i just want it to happen when i first like a tutorial island type of thing. just having the dialogue work when you login on a new accouunt.

item.title: PI adding dialogue when you log in for the first time!
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

PlayerAssistant.java

find the addStarter method

put in there somewhere:

c.getDH().sendDialogues(dialogueID, npcID);

Read full topic
item.source: PI adding dialogue when you log in for the first time!
